metadata.subject: Michael Wolff: My Insane Year Inside Trump's White House

analysis.summary: Nicholas Ribis emails Jeffrey Epstein with high importance, sharing a link to a Hollywood Reporter article about Michael Wolff's book detailing his year inside Trump's White House, indicating Epstein's interest in political insider information.
